HEAD.title: Pennsylvania Spatial Data Access | Full Metadata

DIV.PRE: This layer contains the locations of fishing and boating access areas that have been veirified by the Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission and are public or semi-public areas. In addition, accesses identified by water trail partners on water trail guides have been added to the layer.

Mapping of the location of access areas throughout Pennsylvania, promotion of fishing and boating opportunities in Pennsylvania, key data layer in numerous maps, guides and brochures produced by the PFBC.

This layer was originally compiled by multiple sources including the Pennsylvania Environmental Council (PEC), Pennsylvania Department of Transportation (PennDOT), Westsylvania Heritage Corporation and numerous water trail partners. All sources for the layer have been imported into a centralized layer by the PFBC which is continuously updated. Many of the updates are spatial in terms of moving points to GPS collected locations or visually based on high accurayc aerial photography - namely PAMap and the 2004 National Agricultural Imagery Program Color Infrared photography.

None provided credit is given to the Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission (PFBC) as long as the data is in its original unaltered state. If modifications are made to the data set, users are obligated to describe the types of modifications they have made. Users are not to misrepresent PFBC data sets, nor to imply that changes they (users) have made were approved by the PFBC.

DL.DD: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

DIV.PRE: Layer under continuous update to increase accuracy

This layer was originally compiled by multiple sources including the Pennsylvania Environmental Council (PEC), Pennsylvania Department of Transportation (PennDOT), Westsylvania Heritage Corporation and numerous water trail partners. The layer has since been imported into a centralized layer by the PFBC and is continuously updated. Many of the updates are spatial in terms of moving points to GPS collected locations or visually based on high accurayc aerial photography - namely PAMap and the 2004 National Agricultural Imagery Program Color Infrared photography.

DL.DT: Altitude_Encoding_Method:Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

DL.DD: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

DIV.PRE: PFBC Region where access is located
Map ID number used on the Annual PFBC Pennsylvania Fishing and Boating Map, Region Guides, and County Guides for the access
Map ID number used on the Annual PFBC Pennsylvania Fishing and Boating Map, Region Guides, and County Guides for the access
Unique number of the PFBC Law Enforcement Region where the access is located
Unique number of the Waterways Conservation Officer District where the access is located
Unique number of the Waterways Conservation Officer whose jurisdiction the access is under
County where the access is located
Name of water body served by the access
Municipality where the access is located
Name of owner of the access
Unique name for the access area
General category of ownership of the access
What the horsepower-restricting regulations are on the immediate water served by the access
Whether a fee is charged for use of the access
Whether a fishing pier is present at the access
Whether shore fishing is available at the access
Whether parking is present at the access and what type
Larger Parking Lot (10 spaces or more)
Small Parking Lot with fewer than 10 spaces
Absence of any formal parking lot and the need to find parking along the roadway
Parking is present, but unsure of the amount of spaces available
Whether trailer parking is present at the access
Whether a paved parking lot is present at the access
Whether a boat ramp is present at the access
Whether a paved boat ramp is present at the access
Whether a dock is present at the access
Whether a cable is present at the access
Whether the access is a "Universally Accessible Area" (accessible for the disabled)
Condition rating assigned by the PFBC
Whether access location has been moved based on GPS coordinate
Whether access location has been moved based on aerial photography
Major drainage basin location of the access
Longitude of access location (calculated by GIS)
Latitude of access location (calculated by GIS)
Whether a concrete walkway/pad is present
Whether a boat marina is present
Whether handicapped portable toilets are present
Web page link with further information about access waterbody
Whether American Disabilities Act Facilities are present
